comment: /**  * Build the explanation of the current document being scored  * The script score needs the Explanation of the sub query score because it might use _score and  * want to explain how that was computed.  *  * @param subQueryScore the Explanation for _score  */
code: /**  * Build the explanation of the current document being scored  * The script score needs the Explanation of the sub query score because it might use _score and  * want to explain how that was computed.  *  * @param subQueryScore the Explanation for _score  */ Explanation explain(Explanation subQueryScore) throws IOException.
